options.name: Soldier
options.description: Gain +1 Fitness and +1 Physical Mitigation while wearing Armor.

options.name: Combat Training
options.description: Gain proficiency with all weapon types. You gain +1 to Attack with all weapon types.

options.name: Tactical Armor
options.description: Reduce the Stealth penalty from Medium and Heavy Armor by 1. Additionally, gain +1 Physical Mitigation while wearing Armor.

options.name: Action : Tactical Maneuver
options.description: Move up to half your movement speed without provoking opportunity attacks. This movement does not count against your movement for the turn.

options.name: Reaction : Protect Ally
options.description: When an adjacent ally would be hit by an attack, you can choose to become the target of that attack instead.

options.name: Combat Expertise
options.description: Gain +1 to all Attack modifiers and +1 Physical Mitigation while wearing Armor.

options.name: Action : Coordinate Attack
options.description: Designate one enemy within sight. Until the start of your next turn, all allies gain a +1d4 Attack bonus against that enemy.

options.name: Battle Hardened
options.description: Gain resistance to Fear effects and +5 maximum Health. You can make a Fitness check to resist being Stunned or Dazed.

options.name: Master Soldier
options.description: You gain an additional action each turn that can be used only to Attack, Help, or use a Soldier ability. Additionally, gain +1 to all Attack rolls and +2 Physical Mitigation.
